# Utility Belt

> A free, open-source collection of developer utility tools built with React and TypeScript. All tools run entirely in the browser with no server-side processing.

## Tools

- [String Case Converter](https://chayuto.github.io/utility-belt/tools/string-case-converter): Convert text between uppercase, lowercase, camelCase, snake_case, kebab-case, Title Case, and Sentence case.
- [Ruby to JSON Converter](https://chayuto.github.io/utility-belt/tools/ruby-to-json): Convert Ruby hash syntax (including hash rockets, symbols, and nested structures) to valid JSON format. Supports multiple parser presets.
- [Thai Text Modifier](https://chayuto.github.io/utility-belt/tools/thai-modifier): Modify Thai text with transformations including tone mark removal, vowel removal, Thai/Arabic numeral conversion, and Thai-English spacing.
- [Thai Text Obfuscator](https://chayuto.github.io/utility-belt/tools/thai-obfuscator): Transform Thai text into visually identical but machine-unreadable variants using homoglyph, zero-width, composite, and phonetic strategies.

## Optional

- [Full documentation](https://chayuto.github.io/utility-belt/llms-full.txt)
